name: The Passenger (itch)
description:
The Passenger was my graduation project at the University of the Arts Utrecht. The project itself is finished, but if you have any feedback, let me know!

While driving home from work for the last time, a man suddenly notices a unfamiliar boy sleeping on the back seat. What should the man do, wake the kid up, or keep driving?

Through interactive dialogue you are given the power to decide what characters do or say. Next to this, you can also switch perspective and control a different character's actions within the same scene.
